body_html: Yes these would all be reasonable solutions. The problem I'm having right now is that I'm unable to run the model at all, which is a big step down from having to do some extra GPU<->CPU copying. I've tried to manually enforce sequential computations using control_dependencies, and it's alleviated the problem somewhat, but there are still many models I can't run that I would be able to otherwise.

body: Yes these would all be reasonable solutions. The problem I'm having right now is that I'm unable to run the model _at all_, which is a big step down from having to do some extra GPU<->CPU copying. I've tried to manually enforce sequential computations using `control_dependencies`, and it's alleviated the problem somewhat, but there are still many models I can't run that I would be able to otherwise.
